additionalProperties.description: Azure Files or Blob Storage access information value for dictionary storage.

accessKey.description: AccessKey: Access key for the storage account.

key.description: Key is the key in the Kubernetes secret being referenced

name.description:
Name is the name of the Kubernetes secret being referenced.
The secret must be in the same namespace as the resource

accountName.description: AccountName: Name of the storage account.

mountPath.description: MountPath: Path to mount the storage within the site's runtime environment.

shareName.description: ShareName: Name of the file share (container name, for Blob storage).

clientId.description: ClientId: Client Id of user assigned identity

principalId.description: PrincipalId: Principal Id of user assigned identity

state.description: State: State of the storage account.
